meshes.name: Y-Shaped Tube (Medium)
meshes.description: A 2D longitudinal cross-section representing a flow channel that starts as a single rectangular inlet and splits into two parallel outlet branches.

meshes.name: Venturi (Medium)
meshes.description: A 2D longitudinal cross-section of a Venturi tube with smooth converging and diverging sections. The channel narrows at the throat to accelerate flow, then expands to recover pressure.

meshes.name: T-Junction (Medium)
meshes.description: A 2D main channel with perpendicular branch with a left edge of main channel as inlet and the right edge of main channel and top of branch as outlets.

meshes.name: Backward-Facing Step (Medium)
meshes.description: A 2D main channel with a backward-facing step (a classic CFD benchmark) where inlet is a narrow left edge and the outlet is at the right edge. Step at junction of inlet and outlet sections.

meshes.name: Y-Shaped Tube (Small)
meshes.description: A 2D longitudinal cross-section representing a flow channel that starts as a single rectangular inlet and splits into two parallel outlet branches.
